resources.string: 페이스 같은 건 잊고 그냥 달려보세요. NRC와 함께 러닝을 완료한 후에는 여기에서 러닝 거리, 통계, 달성 기록을 확인할 수 있습니다.
NRC training plans give you weekly coaching and guidance to help you reach your goals.

You\'ll get the guidance, motivation and inspiration to run better, faster, further, recover better and have more fun. The goal is to not only get you stronger and faster, but also smarter. We believe that becoming a better athlete involves becoming a better coach.
